item.title: Ring Solar Panel (1st Generation), 2.4W, Barrel Plug Connector
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
Barrel plug connector works exclusively with Ring Spotlight Cam Battery and Stick Up Cam Battery (2nd and 3rd generations only). May be used with USB-C input Ring Cameras (Spotlight Cam Plus, Spotlight Cam Pro) with the Ring Barrel Plug to USB-C Adapter – *adapter sold separately. With just a few hours of direct sunlight every …

Ring Solar Panel (1st Generation), 2.4W, Barrel Plug Connector Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• Barrel plug connector works exclusively with Ring Spotlight Cam Battery and Stick Up Cam Battery (2nd and 3rd generations only).
  • May be used with USB-C input Ring Cameras (Spotlight Cam Plus, Spotlight Cam Pro) with the Ring Barrel Plug to USB-C Adapter – *adapter sold separately.
  • With just a few hours of direct sunlight every day, your Ring Camera will stay charged around the clock.
  • Power connection is 13 feet. Item dimensions is 7.75 x 5.50 x 0.50 inch.
  • Ring recommends at least 3-4 hours of direct sunlight, depending on your usage. Ability to recharge varies based on device settings, motion notifications and sun exposure in the area of placement.

item.title: Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection
item.dc:creator: camsa
item.description:
1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC. An update from the original Ring Video Doorbell, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and crisper night vision. Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in …

Ring Video Doorbell – 1080p HD video, improved motion detection Read More »
item.content:encoded:
• 1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC.
  • An update from the original Ring Video Doorbell, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and crisper night vision.
  • Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
  • Powered by the built-in rechargeable battery or connects to existing doorbell wires for constant power.
  • Easily setup by connecting your Ring Video Doorbell to wifi through the Ring app and mounting with the included tools.
  • With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 180 days, and share videos and photos.
  • Pair with select Alexa-enabled devices to enable announcements and two-way talk for convenient in-home monitoring. With a Ring Protect plan (subscription sold separately), Alexa can also make voice announcements and automatically show live video feed on an Echo Show, Fire TV, or Fire Tablet when your Ring doorbell detects a person or package.
